name: Haborym
desc: The name Haborym is supposedly borne by all mortal Archons of Natlan. The current Archon is Mavuika.

customize.name: Xbalanque
customize.desc: The first Pyro Archon, who defeated the Flamelord and revived from the flames.

customize.text: The first Pyro Archon who ascended the divine throne after killing the Pyro Dragon

customize.name: Xiuhcoatl
customize.desc: The Pyro Sovereign, defeated by the first Pyro Archon, Xbalanque. He faked his own death, after which the descendants of the ancient dragons could only bow before the throne and watch as their civilization inevitably faded away with each passing day.

customize.text: and rebirth from the Sacred Flame. He made an agreement with

customize.name: Ronova
customize.desc: The Ruler of Death, one of the Primordial One's Shades.

customize.text:
and set the rules of Natlan: Ode of Resurrection and Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame.
Youth with the scarlet eyes
The second Pyro Archon who overthrew the tyrant of the Cinder City,

customize.name: Och-Kan
customize.desc: A dragon mixed with a human soul, the ruler of the Cinder City, known as the Python King and Sacred Lord.

customize.text:
, as he did not want there to be other Archons besides Xbalanque.
Cochanina
A Pyro Archon who drove the Volcano Lord from the lands of the People of the Springs. In the battle with the Abyss, she stood firm until the very end, but fire, swords, and death never ceased to ravage her homeland. At the last, she would kneel before the icy coffins and reflect upon the image the rain puddles painted of her.
Xumucul
The unrivaled warrior who regretted lifting his weapon before the tombs of his companions. or if this battle could never have been won, then he was no leader, but a cruel, lonesome king.
Ndenge
He fought for Natlan all his life, shed and spent his fiery blood, only to learn the truth of war from the Sacred Flame once he had attained the throne. He was not a hero, beloved by all â€” he was but a blind, ignorant clown, for humanity can never hope to conquer the true master.

customize.name: Mavuika
customize.desc: The leader of Natlan who inherited the Ancient Name of "Kiongozi." She made a vow to illuminate the future of the nation of war with the Sacred Flame.

customize.text: The current Pyro Archon. She had been ruling during the

customize.name: Khaenri'ahn cataclysm
customize.desc: A disaster that occurred 500 years ago. The Abyss was released into Teyvat and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.

customize.text: but the tribes were not ready to fight the Abyss back then. Mavuika created a plan to save Natlan 500 years later and entered the Sacred Flame to be reborn when the time came. With the help of the six heroes, the divine throne, and Ronova's powers, she completely destroyed the Abyss in Natlan.

customize.name: Surf's Up
customize.desc: A commemorative item originally reserved for the champion of the "First All-Tribe Surfing Championship." Since said tournament is currently in the preparatory stage, the prize is in temporary storage at the Leisurely Puffer, with the shop owner as its custodian.

customize.name: A Thousand Blazing Suns
customize.desc: A greatsword that dazzles like the rising sun. It has witnessed the extinguishing and rekindling of innumerable suns.

customize.name: Obsidian Ancient Name
customize.desc:
An Ancient Name, Tumaini, forged after many twists and turns, whose meaning is "hope."
You are its first bearer, and it shall record all your deeds and adventures in Natlan, to be passed down forevermore.
"Wisdom" is not the sole domain of living things, nor are all memories or emotions a "blessing." It is a nameless, shapeless existence, nor can common sense comprehend it. Just as we know naught about places that no light may touch, we cannot be sure that there are not countless pairs of eyes watching us from the deepest reaches of the dark. It is a condescending thing that lusts after the knowledge and information stored in the land. Even the horror and despair, which humans can never transcend, are mere emotions "simulated" for your benefit once it has understood all that Natlan is.
